name: UIScene.OpenURLOptions
desc: Options that UIKit provides when asking your app to open a URL.

items.name: var sourceApplication: String?
items.desc: The bundle ID of the app that originated the request.

items.name: var annotation: Any?
items.desc: A property-list object that contains the annotation data provided by a document interaction controller.

items.name: var openInPlace: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether you should open the URL at its current location instead of copying it to your app's container.
